series_description: This series documents the authorization of an importer to represent an out-of-state brand owner, specifically that individuals are authorized agents of the owner. It also documents the wholesale licensees that are authorized by importer to distribute such brand within the commonwealth. series may consist of, but is not limited to: correspondence, forms, and lists

This series documents the licensing of a one-time purchase, sale, gratuitous distribution, and/or use of alcoholic beverages at banquets, company picnics, wedding receptions, and other special events; as well as the agency's actions to monitor and control the use of alcohol at these events. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, affidavits, receipts, notifications, and reports

This series documents the licensing of retail and industry entities to possess, sell, transport, distribute, and/or deliver alcoholic beverages in the commonwealth. It also documents any complaints made and disciplinary actions taken against licensees and the annual certification of licensees' eligibility to continue doing businesses. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, receipts, reports, charters, health permits, floorplans, lease agreements, hearing findings, correspondence, and court orders.
This series documents the annual review of mixed beverage licensees, specifically for compliance with the food-beverage ratio requirement. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms

This series documents the process for issuing permits that authorize the solicitation, use, distribution, tasting, delivering, transporting, and storage of all alcohol solely for stand-alone purposes or as a complement to an existing license. This may include, but is not limited to: applications, bills of lading, invoices, receipts, permits, hearing findings, court orders, and correspondence
